events.message: I recently received my order, but the item arrived with multiple scratches and a broken handle. This is very disappointing since I was looking forward to using it immediately.
System has categorized the complaint under 'Product Defect' due to reports of damage including scratches and broken parts in the delivered item.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Lisa M. who will assist with your reported product issues shortly.
Hello, this is Lisa from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the damage to your product; I’m here to help resolve this for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged item showing the scratches and broken handle? This will help us process your complaint faster.
I have attached several photos clearly showing the scratches along the side and the broken handle. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement item shipped at no extra cost, or if you prefer, a full refund. Please let us know which option works best for you.
I would appreciate a replacement, as I really like this product and want to use it. Thanks for offering that option so quickly.
Your replacement order has been placed and will be shipped within 2 business days. We appreciate your patience and are sorry for the inconvenience.
We’re checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement item and that it meets your expectations. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
As we have not received any further concerns, we will now close this case. Thank you for your cooperation and for choosing our service.
